attributes.action: To make gas training for all plumbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Make Gas Training Free for all Plumbers that have being doing Plumbing for more than Twenty Years, Withtout the need to do on Job Training  Electrian  do not have this problem and  do any more on job training etc, to upgrade Theirs at Present,This would help the older Plumber carry on working and making it possible to pass on their Know how to the Younger ones,That seem to have a problem finshing their Training at present (ps Wake up to the real World and stop making it aNanny State)

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
